raw_analysis:
### Summary
- **UTM Parameter Preservation**: Added `UtmPreserver` React component to automatically append UTM parameters to Copilot links on `/copilot/get-started/plans` pages. Uses URL query params and event listeners for dynamic links.
- **CodeQL Workflow Update**: Modified PR body in GitHub Actions workflow (`generate-code-scanning-query-lists.yml`) to clarify Docs team review process and include sync commit SHA reference.

Add UTM tracking for Copilot plans & update CodeQL query table automation
